Register.attendanceSubtitleForm: Register to attend the conference by filling out the form below.
Register.attendanceDescription: The conference will focus on updating knowledge and improving skills in caring for premature and low birth weight infants receiving Kangaroo Mother Care (KMC) - a method that has been proven to reduce mortality and morbidity among premature and low- birth-weight infants. The conference is honored to welcome clinical experts and researchers from many countries around the world to share valuable experiences as well as the latest research results on this method of care. In addition, the conference will promote the need for widespread application of the KMC in the regional medical community.

WelcomeMessage.title: WELCOME MESSAGE
WelcomeMessage.subtitle: THE THIRD REGIONAL CONFERENCE OF ASIA-OCEANIA NETWORK OF KANGAROO MOTHER CARE
WelcomeMessage.salutation: Dear Delegates, Experts, and distinguished guests,
WelcomeMessage.intro: We warmly welcome you to the Third Regional Conference of the Asia-Oceania Network of Kangaroo Mother Care, held in Da Nang City – a place where the majestic beauty of nature, with its long, white sandy beaches and clear blue waters, meets the dynamic and modern pace of a young city in Central Vietnam.
WelcomeMessage.slogan: This year's conference carries a profound message: “Early and continuous Kangaroo Mother Care - Warmth of love, for a healthy future”
WelcomeMessage.paragraph1: The Kangaroo method - initiated as early as possible after birth and maintained continuously - has been proven to be an effective, comprehensive, and humane strategy integrated into the care of premature and low-birth-weight infants. This method not only helps reduce neonatal mortality rates but also promotes holistic development and strengthens the emotional bond between mother and child.
WelcomeMessage.paragraph2: This conference is a special occasion to bring together leading experts from the region and around the world in the field of neonatal care, especially for premature and low-birth-weight infants. It serves as a prestigious scientific forum to update the latest evidence, share practical experiences, and foster professional collaboration towards the sustainable expansion of the Kangaroo method in healthcare facilities - from central to local levels. Through this, we join hands to build a strong support network, aiming for a healthier future for children throughout the region.
WelcomeMessage.closing: We wish all delegates good health, success, and memorable experiences in the friendly and hospitable city of Da Nang!
